entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
